1.1: PLANT 1.1 - Definitions: In the Conditions of Contract (these Conditions), which include Particular Conditions & these General Conditions, the following words & expressions shall have the meanings stated. Words indicating persons or parties include corporations & other legal entities, except where the context requires otherwise [1.1.1 The Contract, 1.1.2 Parties & persons, 1.1.3 Dates, Tests, periods & completion, 1.1.4 Money & Payments, 1.1.5 Works & goods, 1.1.6 Other definitions].#1.1.1,1.1.2,1.1.3,1.1.4,1.1.5,1.1.6
1.1.1: PLANT 1.1.1 - The Contract: 1.1.1(1) Contract, 1.1.1(2) Contract Agreement, 1.1.1(3) Letter of Acceptance, 1.1.1(4) Letter of Tender, 1.1.1(5) Employer's Requirements, 1.1.1(6) Schedules, 1.1.1(7) Contractor's Proposal, 1.1.1(8) Tender, 1.1.1(9) Appendix to Tender, 1.1.1(10) Schedule of Guarantees and Schedule of Payments.#1.1.1.1,1.1.1.2,1.1.1.3,1.1.1.4,1.1.1.5,1.1.1.6,1.1.1.7,1.1.1.8,1.1.1.9,1.1.1.10
1.1.1.1: PLANT 1.1.1.1 - Contract: 'Contract' means the Contract Agreement, the Letter of Acceptance, the Letter of Tender, these Conditions, the Employer's Requirements, the Schedules, the Contractor's proposal, & the further documents (if any) which are listed in the Contract Agreement or in the Letter of Acceptance.
1.1.1.2: PLANT 1.1.1.2 - Contract Agreement: 'Contract Agreement' means the contract agreement (if any) referred to in SC 1.6 [Contract Agreement].#1.6
1.1.1.3: PLANT 1.1.1.3 - Letter of Acceptance: 'Letter of Acceptance' means the letter of formal acceptance, signed by the Employer, of the Letter of Tender, including any annexed memoranda comprising agreements between & signed by both Parties. If there is no such letter of acceptance, the expression 'Letter of Acceptance' means the Contract Agreement & the date of issuing or receiving the Letter of Acceptance means the date of signing the Contract Agreement.
1.1.1.4: PLANT 1.1.1.4 - Letter of Tender: 'Letter of Tender' means the document entitled letter of tender, which was completed by the Contractor & includes the signed offer to the Employer for the Works.
1.1.1.5: PLANT 1.1.1.5 - Employer's Requirements: 'Employer's Requirements' means the document entitled employer's requirements, as included in the Contract, and any additions and modifications to such document in accordance with the Contract. Such document specifies the purpose, scope, and/or design and/or other technical criteria, for the Works.
1.1.1.6: PLANT 1.1.1.6 - Schedules: 'Schedules' means the document(s) entitled schedules, completed by the Contractor and submitted with the Letter of Tender, as included in the Contract. Such document may include data, lists and schedules of payments and/or prices.
1.1.1.7: PLANT 1.1.1.7 - Contractor's Proposal: 'Contractor's Proposal' means the document entitled proposal, which the Contractor submitted with the Letter of Tender, as included in the Contract. Such document may include the Contractor's preliminary design.
1.1.1.8: PLANT 1.1.1.8 - Tender: 'Tender' means the Letter of Tender & all other documents which the Contractor submitted with the Letter of Tender, as included in the Contract.
1.1.1.9: PLANT 1.1.1.9 - Appendix to Tender: 'Appendix to Tender' means the completed pages entitled appendix to tender which are appended to & form part of the Letter of Tender.
1.1.1.10: PLANT 1.1.1.10 - Schedule of Guarantees & Schedule of Payments: 'Schedule of Guarantees' & 'Schedule of Payments' mean the documents so named (if any) which are comprised in the Schedules.
1.1.2: PLANT 1.1.2 - Parties & persons: 1.1.2(1) Party, 1.1.2(2) Employer, 1.1.2(3) Contractor, 1.1.2(4) Engineer, 1.1.2(5) Contractor's Representative, 1.1.2(6) Employer's Personnel, 1.1.2(7) Contractor's Personnel, 1.1.2(8) Subcontractor, 1.1.2(9) DAB, 1.1.2(10) FIDIC.#1.1.2.1,1.1.2.2,1.1.2.3,1.1.2.4,1.1.2.5,1.1.2.6,1.1.2.7,1.1.2.8,1.1.2.9,1.1.2.10
1.1.2.1: PLANT 1.1.2.1 - Party: 'Party' means the Employer or the Contractor, as the context requires.
1.1.2.2: PLANT 1.1.2.2 - Employer: 'Employer' means the person named as employer in the Appendix to Tender & the legal successors in title to this person.
1.1.2.3: PLANT 1.1.2.3 - Contractor: 'Contractor' means the person(s) named as contractor in the Letter of Tender accepted by the Employer & the legal successors in title to this person(s).
1.1.2.4: PLANT 1.1.2.4 - Engineer: 'Engineer' means the person appointed by the Employer to act as the Engineer for the purposes of the Contract & named in the Appendix to Tender, or other person appointed from time to time by the Employer & notified to the Contractor under SC 3.4 [Replacement of the Engineer].#3.4
1.1.2.5: PLANT 1.1.2.5 - Contractor's Representative: 'Contractor's Representative' means the person named by the Contractor in the Contract or appointed from time to time by the Contractor under SC 4.3 [Contractor's Representative], who acts on behalf of the Contractor.#4.3
1.1.2.6: PLANT 1.1.2.6 - Employer's Personnel: 'Employer's Personnel' means the Engineer, the assistants referred to in SC 3.2 [Delegation by the Engineer] & all other staff, labour & other employees of the Engineer & of the Employer; & any other personnel notified to the Contractor, by the Employer or the Engineer, as Employer's Personnel.#3.2
1.1.2.7: PLANT 1.1.2.7 - Contractor's Personnel: 'Contractor's Personnel' means the Contractor's Representative & all personnel whom the Contractor utilises on Site, who may include the staff, labour & other employees of the Contractor & of each Subcontractor; & any other personnel assisting the Contractor in the execution of the Works.
1.1.2.8: PLANT 1.1.2.8 - Subcontractor: 'Subcontractor' means any person named in the Contract as a subcontractor, or any person appointed as a subcontractor, for a part of the Works; & the legal successors in title to each of these persons.
1.1.2.9: PLANT 1.1.2.9 - DAB: 'DAB' means the person or three persons so named in the Contract, or other person(s) appointed under SC 20.2 [Appointment of the Dispute Adjudication Board] or SC 20.3 [Failure to Agree Dispute Adjudication Board].#20.2,20.3
1.1.3: PLANT 1.1.3 - Dates, tests, periods & completion: 1.1.3(1) Base Date, 1.1.3(2) Commencement Date, 1.1.3(3) Time for Completion, 1.1.3(4) Tests on Completion, 1.1.3(5) Taking-Over Certificate, 1.1.3(6) Tests after Completion, 1.1.3(7) Defects Notification Period, 1.1.3(8) Performance Certificate, 1.1.3(9) day.#1.1.3.1,1.1.3.2,1.1.3.3,1.1.3.4,1.1.3.5,1.1.3.6,1.1.3.7,1.1.3.8,1.1.3.9
1.1.3.1: PLANT 1.1.3.1 - Base Date: 'Base Date' means the date 28 days prior to the latest date for submission of the Tender.
1.1.3.2: PLANT 1.1.3.2 - Commencement Date: 'Commencement Date' means the date notified under SC 8.1 [Commencement of Works].
1.1.3.3: PLANT 1.1.3.3 - Time for Completion: 'Time for Completion' means the time for completing the Works or a Section (as the case may be) under SC 8.2 [Time for Completion], as stated in the Appendix to Tender (with any extension under SC 8.4 [Extension of Time for Completion]), calculated from the Commencement Date.#8.2,8.4
1.1.3.4: PLANT 1.1.3.4 - Tests on Completion: 'Tests on Completion' means the tests which are specified in the Contract or agreed by both Parties or instructed as a Variation, & which are carried out under Clause 9 [Tests on Completion] before the Works or a Section (as the case may be) are taken over by the Employer.#9
1.1.3.5: PLANT 1.1.3.5 - Taking-Over Certificate: 'Taking-Over Certificate' means a certificate issued under Clause 10 [Employer's taking over].#10
1.1.3.6: PLANT 1.1.3.6 - Tests after Completion: 'Tests after Completion' means the tests (if any) which are specified in the Contract and which are carried out under Clause 12 [Tests after Completion] after the Works or a Section (as the case may be) are taken over by the Employer.#12
1.1.3.7: PLANT 1.1.3.7 - Defects Notification Period: 'Defects Notification Period' means the period for notifying defects in the Works or a Section (as the case may be) under SC 11.1 [Completion of outstanding work & remedying defects], as stated in the Appendix to Tender (with any extension under SC 11.3 [Extension of Defects Notification Period]), calculated from the date on which the Works or Section is completed as certified under SC 10.1 [Taking over of the Works & Sections].#11.1,11.3,10.1
1.1.3.8: PLANT 1.1.3.8 - Performance Certificate: 'Performance Certificate' means the certificate issued under SC 11.9 [Performance Certificate].#11.9
1.1.3.9: PLANT 1.1.3.9 - day: 'day' means a calendar day & 'year' means 365 days.
1.1.4: PLANT 1.1.4 - Money & Payments: 1.1.4(1) Accepted Contract Amount, 1.1.4(2) Contract Price, 1.1.4(3) Cost, 1.1.4(4) Final Payment Certificate, 1.1.4(5) Final Statement, 1.1.4(6) Foreign Currency, 1.1.4.(7) Interim Payment Certificate, 1.1.4(8) Local Currency, 1.1.4(9) Payment Certificate, 1.1.4(10) Provisional Sum, 1.1.4(11) Retention Money, 1.1.4(12) Statement.#1.1.4.1,1.1.4.2,1.1.4.3,1.1.4.4,1.1.4.5,1.1.4.6,1.1.4.7,1.1.4.8,1.1.4.9,1.1.4.10,1.1.4.11,1.1.4.12
1.1.4.1: PLANT 1.1.4.1 - Accepted Contract Amount: 'Accepted Contract Amount' means the amount accepted in the Letter of Acceptance for the execution & completion of the Works & the remedying of any defects.
1.1.4.2: PLANT 1.1.4.2 - Contract Price: 'Contract Price' means the price defined in SC 14.1 [The Contract Price], & includes adjustments in accordance with the Contract.#14.1
1.1.4.3: PLANT 1.1.4.3 - Cost: 'Cost' means all expenditure reasonably incurred (or to be incurred) by the Contractor, whether on or off the Site, including overhead & similar charges, but does not include profit.
1.1.4.4: PLANT 1.1.4.4 - Final Payment Certificate: 'Final Payment Certificate' means the payment certificate issued under SC 14.13 [Issue of Final Payment Certificate].#14.13
1.1.4.5: PLANT 1.1.4.5 - Final Statement: 'Final Statement' means the statement defined in SC 14.11 [Application for Final Payment Certificate].#14.11
1.1.4.6: PLANT 1.1.4.6 - Foreign Currency: 'Foreign Currency' means a currency in which part (or all) of the Contract Price is payable, but not the Local Currency.
1.1.4.7: PLANT 1.1.4.7 - Interim Payment Certificate: 'Interim Payment Certificate' means a payment certificate issued under Clause 14 [Contract Price & payment], other than the Final Payment Certificate.
1.1.4.8: PLANT 1.1.4.8 - Local Currency: 'Local Currency' means the currency of the Country.
1.1.4.9: PLANT 1.1.4.9 - Payment Certificate: 'Payment Certificate' means a payment certificate issued under Clause 14 [Contract Price & payment].#14
1.1.4.10: PLANT 1.1.4.10 - Provisional Sum: 'Provisional Sum' means a sum (if any) which is specified in the Contract as a provisional sum, for the execution of any part of the Works or for the supply of Plant, Materials or services under SC 13.5 [Provisional Sums].#13.5
1.1.4.11: PLANT 1.1.4.11 - Retention Money: 'Retention Money' means the accumulated retention moneys which the Employer retains under SC 14.3 [Application for Interim Payment Certificates] & pays under SC 14.9 [Payment of Retention Money].#14.3
1.1.4.12: PLANT 1.1.4.12 - Statement: 'Statement' means a statement submitted by the Contractor as part of an application, under Clause 14 [Contract Price & payment], for a payment certificate.
1.1.5.1: PLANT 1.1.5.1 - Contractor's Equipment: 'Contractor's Equipment' means all apparatus, machinery, vehicles & other things required for the execution & completion of the Works & the remedying of any defects. However, Contractor's Equipment excludes Temporary Works, Employer's Equipment (if any), Plant, Materials & any other things intended to form or forming part of the Permanent Works.
1.1.5.2: PLANT 1.1.5.2 - Goods: 'Goods' means Contractor's Equipment, Materials, Plant & Temporary Works, or any of them as appropriate.
1.1.5.3: PLANT 1.1.5.3 - Materials: 'Materials' means things of all kinds (other than Plant) intended to form or forming part of the Permanent Works, including the supply-only materials (if any) to be supplied by the Contractor under the Contract.
1.1.5.4: PLANT 1.1.5.4 - Permanent Works: 'Permanent Works' means the permanent works to be executed by the Contractor under the Contract.
1.1.5.5: PLANT 1.1.5.5 - Plant: 'Plant' means the apparatus, machinery & vehicles intended to form or forming part of the Permanent Works.
1.1.5.6: PLANT 1.1.5.6 - Section: 'Section' means a part of the Works specified in the Appendix to Tender as a Section (if any).
1.1.5.7: PLANT 1.1.5.7 - Temporary Works: 'Temporary Works' means all temporary works of every kind (other than Contractor's Equipment) required on Site for the execution & completion of the Permanent Works & the remedying of any defects.
1.1.5.8: PLANT 1.1.5.8 - Works: 'Works' mean the Permanent Works & the Temporary Works, or either of them as appropriate.
1.1.6: PLANT 1.1.6 - Other definitions: 1.1.6(1) Contractor's Documents, 1.1.6(2) Country, 1.1.6(3) Employer's Equipment, 1.1.6(4) Force Majeure, 1.1.6(5) Laws, 1.1.6(6) Performance Security, 1.1.6(7) Site, 1.1.6(8) Unforseeable, 1.1.6(9) Variation. #1.1.6.1,1.1.6.2,1.1.6.3,1.1.6.4,1.1.6.5,1.1.6.6,1.1.6.7,1.1.6.8,1.1.6.9
1.1.6.1: PLANT 1.1.6.1 - Contractor's Documents: 'Contractor's Documents' means the calculations, computer programs & other software, drawings, manuals, models & other documents of a technical nature (if any) supplied by the Contractor under the Contract, as described in SC5.2 [Contractor's Documents].#5.2
1.1.6.2: PLANT 1.1.6.2 - Country: 'Country' means the country in which the Site (or most of it) is lo###ed, where the Permanent Works are to be executed.
1.1.6.3: PLANT 1.1.6.3 - Employer's Equipment: 'Employer's Equipment' means the apparatus, machinery & vehicles (if any) made available by the Employer for the use of the Contractor in the execution of the Works, as stated in the Employer's Requirements; but does not include Plant which has not been taken over by the Employer.
1.1.6.4: PLANT 1.1.6.4 - Force Majeure: 'Force Majeure' is defined in Clause 19 [Force Majeure].#19
1.1.6.5: PLANT 1.1.6.5 - Laws: 'Laws' means all national (or state) legislation, statutes, ordinances & other laws, & regulations & by-laws of any legally constituted public authority.
1.1.6.6: PLANT 1.1.6.6 - Performance Security: 'Performance Security' means the security (or securities, if any) under SC 4.2 [Performance Security].#4.2
1.1.6.7: PLANT 1.1.6.7 - Site: 'Site' means the places where the Permanent Works are to be executed & to which Plant & Materials are to be delivered, & any other places as may be specified in the Contract as forming part of the Site.
1.1.6.8: PLANT 1.1.6.8 - Unforeseeable: 'Unforeseeable' means not reasonably foreseeable by an experienced contractor by the date for submission of the Tender.
1.1.6.9: PLANT 1.1.6.9 - Variation: 'Variation' means any change to the Works, which is instructed or approved as a variation under Clause 13 [Variations & adjustments].#13

PLANT 1.3 - Communications: Wherever these Conditions provide for the giving or issuing of approvals, certificates, consents, determinations, notices & requests, these communications shall be:
(a) in writing & delivered by h& (against receipt), sent by mail or courier, or transmitted using any of the agreed systems of electronic transmission as stated in the Appendix to Tender; &
(b) delivered, sent or transmitted to the address for the recipient's communications as stated in the Appendix to Tender.///However: 
(i) if the recipient gives notice of another address, communications shall thereafter be delivered accordingly; & 
(ii) if the recipient has not stated otherwise when requesting an approval or consent, ///it may be sent to the address from which the request was issued.///Approvals, certificates, consents & determinations shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed. When a certificate is issued to a Party, the certifier shall send a copy to the other Party. When a notice is issued to a Party, by the other Party or the Engineer, a copy shall be sent to the Engineer or the other Party, as the case may be.
1.4: PLANT 1.4 - Law & language: The Contract shall be governed by the law of the country (or other jurisdiction) stated in the Appendix to Tender.///If there are versions of any part of the Contract which are written in more than one language, the version which is in the ruling language stated in the Appendix to Tender shall prevail.///The language for communications shall be that stated in the Appendix to Tender. If no language is stated there, the language for communications shall be the language in which the Contract (or most of it) is written.
1.5:
PLANT 1.5 - Priority of Documents: The documents forming the Contract are to be taken as mutually explanatory of one another. For the purposes of interpretation, the priority of the documents shall be in accordance with the following sequence:
(a) the Contract Agreement (if any), (b) the Letter of Acceptance, (c) the Letter of Tender, (d) the Particular Conditions, (e) these General Conditions, (f) the Employer's Requirements, (g) the Schedules, & (h) the Contractor's Proposal & any other documents forming part of the Contract.///If an ambiguity or discrepancy is found in the documents, the Engineer shall issue any necessary clarification or instruction.
1.6: PLANT 1.6 - Contract agreement: The Parties shall enter into a Contract Agreement within 28 days after the Contractor receives the Letter of Acceptance, unless they agree otherwise. The Contract Agreement shall be based upon the form annexed to the Particular Conditions. The costs of stamp duties & similar charges (if any) imposed by law in connection with entry into the Contract Agreement shall be borne by the Employer.
1.7:
PLANT 1.7 - Assignment: Neither Party shall assign the whole or any part of the Contract or any benefit or interest in or under the Contract. However, either Party:
(a) may assign the whole or any part with the prior agreement of the other Party, at the sole discretion of such other Party, &
(b) may, as security in favour of a bank or financial institution, assign its right to any moneys due, or to become due, under the Contract.
1.8: PLANT 1.8 - Care & supply of Documents: Each of the Contractor's Documents shall be in the custody & care of the Contractor, unless & until taken over by the Employer. Unless otherwise stated in the Contract, the Contractor shall supply to the Engineer six copies of each of the Contractor's Documents.///The Contractor shall keep, on the Site, a copy of the Contract, publications named in the Employer's Requirements, the Contractor's Documents, & Variations & other communications given under the Contract. The Employer's Personnel shall have the right of access to all these documents at all reasonable times.///If a Party becomes aware of an error or defect of a technical nature in a document which was prepared for use in executing the Works, the Party shall promptly give notice to the other Party of such error or defect.

PLANT 1.9 - Errors in the Employer's Requirements: If the Contractor suffers delay and/or incurs Cost as a result of an error in the Employer's Requirements, & an experienced contractor exercising due care would not have discovered the error when scrutinising the Employer's Requirements under SC 5.1 [General design obligations], the Contractor shall give notice to the Engineer & shall be entitled subject to SC 20.1 [Contractor's Claims] to:
(a) an extension of time for any such delay, if completion is or will be delayed, under SC 8.4 [Extension of Time for Completion], and
(b) payment of any such Cost plus reasonable profit, which shall be included in the Contract Price.///After receiving this notice, the Engineer shall proceed in accordance with SC 3.5 [Determinations] to agree or determine (i) whether & (if so) to what extent the error could not reasonably have been so discovered, & (ii) the matters described in sub-paragraphs (a) & (b) above related to this extent.#3.5,5.1,8.4,20.1

The Contractor may, at his cost, copy, use, & obtain communication of these documents for the purposes of the Contract. 1.12: PLANT 1.12 - Confidential details: The Contractor shall disclose all such confidential & other information as the Engineer may reasonably require in order to verify the Contractor's compliance with the Contract.

PLANT 1.13 - Compliance with Laws: The Contractor shall, in performing the Contract, comply with applicable Laws. Unless otherwise stated in the Particular Conditions:
(a) the Employer shall have obtained (or shall obtain) the planning, zoning or similar permission for the Permanent Works, & any other permissions described in the Specification as having been (or being) obtained by the Employer; & the Employer shall indemnify & hold the Contractor harmless against & from the consequences of any failure to do so; &
(b) the Contractor shall give all notices, pay all taxes, duties & fees, & obtain all permits, licences & approvals, as required by the Laws in relation to the execution & completion of the Works & the remedying of any defects; & the Contractor shall indemnify & hold the Employer harmless against & from the consequences of any failure to do so.

PLANT 2.2 - Permits, Licences or Approval: The Employer shall (where he is in a position to do so) provide reasonable assistance to the Contractor at the request of the Contractor:
(a) by obtaining copies of the Laws of the Country which are relevant to the Contract but are not readily available, & 
(b) for the Contractor's applications for any permits, licences or approvals required by the Laws of the Country:(i) which the Contractor is required to obtain under SC1.13 [Compliance with Laws], (ii) for the delivery of Goods, including clearance through customs, & (iii) for the export of Contractor's Equipment when it is removed from the Site.#1.13
